Font.h File Reference

Contains the Font class, a class that encapsulates the rendering of a single FreeType-compatible fonts in italics, with underlining, left-, right-, or center- justified, etc., and the FontManager class which provides application-wide management of Font objects. More...

Detailed Description

Contains the Font class, a class that encapsulates the rendering of a single FreeType-compatible fonts in italics, with underlining, left-, right-, or center- justified, etc., and the FontManager class which provides application-wide management of Font objects.

Definition in file Font.h.
